name: express_01
description: - Create a http server with ExpressJS Framework - Define a local database with `lowdb` module. Initialize it with property `users` set to empty array, and synchronize it with `db.json` file - Define following routes:     - /users (GET method)         - this route should display list of all users from our local database         - this route can take 2 parameters     - /users/add (POST method)         - this route should display HTML form in the browser         - displayed form should have text input, with attribute `name` set to __username__, and submit button         - form itself should have `method` attribute set to "__post__", and `action` attribute set to "__users/add__"
